sqlMap.sql: SELECT B.BO_NO , B.BOARD_CODE , B.BO_TITLE , BO_CONTENT , TO_CHAR(B.BO_REG_DATE,'YY/MM/DD HH24:MI') BO_REG_DATE , B.BO_WRITER , B.BO_GOOD_HIT , M.MEM_NICKNAME , M.MEM_ID , B.BO_HIT , G.BOARD_NAME FROM BOARD B, MEMBER M , BOARDMANAGE G WHERE B.BO_WRITER = M.MEM_ID AND B.BOARD_CODE = G.BOARD_CODE AND B.BO_STATUS= 'y' AND B.BOARD_CODE ='board005' AND M.MEM_ID !='admin'

isNotEmpty.isEqual: B.BO_TITLE LIKE '%'||#keyword#||'%' OR B.BO_CONTENT LIKE '%'||#keyword#||'%' OR M.MEM_NICKNAME LIKE '%'||#keyword#||'%'

sqlMap.select:
SELECT C.* FROM (SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, A.* FROM (
ORDER BY B.BO_NO) A) C
WHERE C.RNUM <= #startCount# AND C.RNUM >=#endCount#
ORDER BY C.RNUM DESC
SELECT COUNT(B.BO_NO) FROM BOARD B, MEMBER M WHERE B.BO_WRITER = M.MEM_ID AND B.BOARD_CODE = 'board005' AND B.BO_STATUS= 'y' AND M.MEM_ID != 'admin'
